itinerary.day1Overview:
In the morning our representative will pick you from your hotel / railway station / airport. Thereafter enjoy a drive to Wayanad via Thrissur, Calicut, Thamarassery, Lakkidi and Kalpetta.

En-route the onlookers can treat their eyes with the jaw-dropping sight of the high altitude mountains. Adding a charm to the picturesque view are the tea, coffee, pepper, cardamom and rubber plantations. This spectacular sight is further complemented with the mesmerizing aroma of these plantations. The saga doesn't end here, along with these cultivated areas, coexist the rich, dense, charismatic and serene sub-tropical forests. With all this and much more Wayanad is a tourist's paradise.

Check into a hotel on arrival and relax for the rest of the day. Later enjoy an overnight stay at the resort.

itinerary.day2Overview:
Have a healthy breakfast and spend the entire day by basking in the picture perfect surroundings.

WWS â€“ 'Wildlife', 'Waterfall' and 'Spices', these three define Wayanad at its best. There are various wildlife sanctuaries in the place that offer a great trip to the visitors. In addition to this, tea and coffee plantations stand as a prime tourist attraction. One can also explore the thrill cuddled in the hilly areas; and thus, Wayanad is nothing less than a paradise for adventurists, especially trekkers.

**Optional: -** Visitors can also take pleasure in exploring the nearby attractions like Edakkal Caves (28 Km) and Pookode Lake(12 Km).

Welcoming the archaeologists, historians and general tourists, the Edakkal Caves are a delight to visit. These caves are bestowed with 5000 years old ancient rock engravings and drawings. The walls of the two main chambers of the cave are said to have etchings of various hunting scenes. These antique pictures on the walls allure travelers from different nooks and corners of the world.

Enclosed by the wonderful evergreen forest, Pookot is a fresh water lake.

Moreover, being located at an altitude of around 2000 meters above the sea level, the lake water offers an amazing reflection of greenery as well as mountains. Moreover the best way to experience the splendor of the place is via a boat ride. Thus, it is among the best places to unveil the true beauty of Mother Nature.

Further, while exploring the place, one can also visit the children's park, small emporium and aquarium.

Later enjoy an overnight stay at the resort.

itinerary.day3Overview: In the morning leave for Cochin after the breakfast. On arrival, head towards the Airport/Railway Station.

overView.heading: Golconda Fort: Architectural Marvel
overView.text: Discover the grandeur of the Golconda Fort, a magnificent fortified citadel that once served as the capital of the Qutb Shahi dynasty. Explore its intricate architectural marvels, including the famous acoustic phenomenon at the Fateh Rahben Gun, and immerse yourself in the rich history of this ancient fort.

overView.heading: Charminar: Iconic Landmark
overView.text: Marvel at the iconic Charminar, a remarkable monument and one of Hyderabad's most recognizable landmarks. This architectural masterpiece, with its four graceful minarets and intricate carvings, stands as a symbol of the city's rich cultural heritage.

overView.heading: Ramoji Film City: Cinematic Extravaganza
overView.text: Experience the magic of Indian cinema at Ramoji Film City, the world's largest integrated film studio complex. Explore the fascinating sets, witness live stunts, and gain insights into the captivating world of filmmaking.

overView.heading: Salarjung Museum: Cultural Treasure Trove
overView.text: Immerse yourself in the cultural heritage of Hyderabad at the renowned Salarjung Museum, which houses an extensive collection of art, artifacts, and antiques spanning centuries. Marvel at the exquisite exhibits, including rare manuscripts, paintings, and intricately carved sculptures.

overView.heading: Hussain Sagar Lake: Picturesque Oasis
overView.text: Unwind by the serene waters of Hussain Sagar Lake, a beautiful man-made lake that offers stunning views and a tranquil escape from the city's hustle and bustle. Take a boat ride to the iconic Buddha statue or simply enjoy the scenic surroundings.

overView.heading: Shilparamam: Crafts Village
overView.text: Explore the vibrant Shilparamam Crafts Village, a cultural hub showcasing the rich heritage of Indian craftsmanship. Witness skilled artisans at work, participate in hands-on workshops, and shop for unique handmade products.

overView.heading: Falaknuma Palace: Opulent Grandeur
overView.text: Step into the world of royalty at the magnificent Falaknuma Palace, a restored 19th-century palace that exudes opulence and grandeur. Marvel at its ornate architecture, lavish interiors, and stunning views of the city skyline.
